body.name: DC Comics, Ultimate Batman Set w/ Exclusive 4” Batman, Selina Kyle, The Penguin Action Figures, Batmobile, Batman Movie Kids Toys, Age 4 and up (Amazon Exclusive)

features: ULTIMATE BATMAN SET: Featuring 3 exclusive Batman figures and Batmobile vehicle, the Ultimate Batman set has everything you need to engage your imagination and create your favorite Batman Movie moments!

3 EXCLUSIVE BATMAN FIGURES: Includes 4-inch Batman, Selina Kyle, and The Penguin action figures with detailed sculpting and authentic movie styling! With 11 points of articulation, it’s easy to pose the action figures!
LIGHT UP BATMAN BATMOBILE WITH SOUNDS: Keep the streets of Gotham City safe with the Batman Batmobile! This Batman vehicle features LED engine lights and 15+ authentic engine sounds!
8 EPIC ACCESSORIES: Bring your figures to life with accessories like Batarangs, Helmet, Umbrella, and much more – just like in the Batman Movie!
BATMAN GIFTS FOR KIDS: Batman playsets are great Batman toys gift for kids. Batman superhero toys are the ultimate holiday and birthday gift for boys and girls.
Includes: 3 Figures, 1 Vehicle, 8 Accessories, 1 Instruction Sheet
Covered by the Spin Master Care Commitment. See below for full details
body.description: The Ultimate Batman Set is a must-have for Batman fans – only available on Amazon! Expand your Batman collection with Batman, Selina Kyle, The Penguin 4-inch action figures! Prevent the Penguin from taking over Gotham City by combating him using the exclusive 4-inch Batman action figure! Race into action with the Batman Batmobile – featuring authentic movie-style sculpting, over 15 sounds effects, and LED lights that will bring your Batman adventures to life! This set has everything you need to engage your imagination and create epic Batman adventures. This iconic set is a must-have toy for boys, girls, and Batman fans! DC fans of all ages will love the interactive features and detailed Batman action figures. Collect all your favorite characters recreate scenes from the movie or engage your imagination and create your own epic adventures. Bring your favorite Batman movie moments to life with the Ultimate Batman Set!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DC Comics, Batman and Lt Gordon Pack Exclusive 4” Action Figures and Police Car Vehicle The Ultimate Batman Set is a must-have for Batman fans – only available on Amazon! Expand your Batman collection with Batman, Selina Kyle, The Penguin 4-inch action figures! Prevent the Penguin from taking over Gotham City by combating him using the exclusive 4-inch Batman action figure! Race into action with the Batman Batmobile – featuring authentic movie-style sculpting, over 15 sounds effects, and LED lights that will bring your Batman adventures to life! Includes: 3 Figures 1 Vehicle 6 Accessories

3 Exclusive Batman Figures Includes 4-inch Batman, Selina Kyle, and The Penguin action figures with detailed sculpting and authentic movie styling! With 11 points of articulation, it’s easy to pose the action figures! Light Up Batmobile Keep the streets of Gotham City safe with the Batman Batmobile! This Batman vehicle features LED engine lights and 15+ authentic engine sounds! 8 Epic Accessories Armor up your figures with accessories like Batarangs, Helmet, Umbrella, and much more – just like in the Batman Movie!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best deal ever!!!
reviews.reviewText: This has got to be the best deal I’ve ever seen. I purchased this for my 4 year old grandson and he absolutely loved it! I can’t believe how awesome the Batman car and figures are. The quality is excellent and the price is super cheap. Two thumbs up for this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: At first I thought there's no way this is this cheap.... but I bought it..... yeah it is that cheap.... perfect for the collection. Rubber wheels, flat black finish and 3 figures included.... I had to open the box because I still even after it arrived thought there's no way..... well uts here and there a pi. To prove it... . It's awesome.... trying not to take it completely apart to play with it..... is 48 too old for to play with toys...lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice set
reviews.reviewText: I got this car and figure's for my 6 year old son he loved it. Very nice for the price & the car was bigger than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this at $8.34. As of this review...its $7.51. This is an amazing deal for a toy of this type. Lights, sounds, four figures, and accessories. Best score so far. The figures themselves are great. Fully pose-able. The Batmobile...what a great piece. It looks so good...and its also not so fragile that it can't be handed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My Grandson love his bat man stuff he got
reviews.reviewText: My Grandson was so excited over the bat cave. When it’s close, it’s a giant Batman.Inside is very cool! There is all kinds of stuff in the bat cave to do. Easy put together snap everything together. Worst thing, putting all the stickers on the inside. It will show you in description, my Grandson loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We got it today. What a deal!! The Batmobile is awesome 👍 and three figures with gear great. What a great price. My nephew is jumping out of his skin. 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my grandson and it is very cool! He loves it. He is 8.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really cool looking batmobile, with rubber tires, lights and sounds. A high end quality addition to my collection for a very good price.
My grandson loves it. Was a Xmas gift and the car is exceptional with all the sounds parts that open.

Definitivamente es un buen juguete, no es de grandes detalles, porque la escala tampoco lo permite sobre todo hablando de las figuras. Es grandioso poder poner a los personajes en los asientos y que entren tal cual por las puertas como en un auto normal. Las llantas de material más suave son muy buen detalle. Es muy cómodo para andarlo llevando de un lado a otro y las luces se ven geniales.

reviews.reviewTitle: très belle voiture et personnages le tout en très bonne qualité
reviews.reviewText: très belle voiture et personnages le tout en très bonne qualité

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great car looks amazing, very good sounds and lights. Action figures come with accessories. Well worth the price.

Set que contiene 3 figuras (batman, catwoman y pinguino) varios accesorios y el batmobil de la pelicula con luces y sonidos.las figuras tienen bastantes puntos de articulacion y son bastante fieles a los personajes.El batmobil es puramente de plastico pero tiene buenos detalles. 15 sonidos y luces. hay un boton debajo del coche para apagarlo, ponerlo en modo tienda o encendido.se pueden poner las figuras dentro del coche ya que se abren las puertas.la relación calidad precio muy buena.
